scripts.persist: git pull --rebase origin main || true && mkdir -p docs/events && cp -R data/events/. docs/events/ 2>/dev/null || true && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='docs/events';let list=[];if(fs.existsSync(p)){for(const f of fs.readdirSync(p)){if(f.endsWith('.json')){try{list.push(JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p+'/'+f,'utf8')));}catch(e){}}}}list.sort((a,b)=>a.receivedAt<b.receivedAt?1:-1);fs.writeFileSync('docs/events.json',JSON.stringify(list,null,2));" && git add data docs && git commit --allow-empty -m "events" && git push origin main
